data.actual_result: There is a "Time Played" segment, it might not always show, can require multiple purchases to successfully reproduce
data.expected_result: It doesn't show time played since Nitro doesn't have that
data.short_description: Nitro purchases in the billing tab show up with a  "Time Played" [Monthly option only]
data.steps_to_repro: - Have Nitro purchased with the monthly option - Go to the Billing tab - Expand one of the purchases made with the monthly option and that it's refund eligibilty has expired - The purchase must be expired, that means you must not have Nitro from that purchase anymore - Observe what it says next to "Purchase Date"
